samples.ui
Class ChatBox

java.lang.Object
  samples.ui.Component
      samples.ui.ChatBox

public class ChatBox
extends Component

This class implements user interface chat message display class.

keyPressed

public boolean keyPressed(int action,
                          int key)
Update the state of this instance in light of a key press action.

Overrides:
keyPressed in class Component
Parameters:
action - The type of action. The ChatBox class handles actions of type Canvas.UP and Canvas.DOWN, and scrolls the chat message window up or down appropriately.
key - The key pressed.
Returns:
true if the instance handled the event, and false if the instance ignored the event.

keyReleased

public boolean keyReleased(int action,
                           int key)
Update the state of this instance in light of a key release action.

Overrides:
keyReleased in class Component
Parameters:
action - The type of action. The CharBox class does not handle any key release actions.
key - The key released.
Returns:
false, because the ChatBox class ignores the event.
